questions.question: Which Autodesk software is primarily used for 3D modeling and animation?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Maya is primarily used for 3D modeling and animation.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for architectural design and documentation?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Revit is used for architectural design and documentation.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is commonly used for mechanical design and engineering?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Inventor is commonly used for mechanical design and engineering.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 2D drawings and drafting?
questions.explanation: Autodesk AutoCAD is used for creating 2D drawings and drafting.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating realistic visualizations and renderings?
questions.explanation: Autodesk 3ds Max is used for creating realistic visualizations and renderings.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D product designs and simulations?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Fusion 360 is used for creating 3D product designs and simulations.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D models and animations for games?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Maya is used for creating 3D models and animations for games.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating detailed 3D models of building structures?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Revit is used for creating detailed 3D models of building structures.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for industrial design and 3D modeling?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Fusion 360 is used for industrial design and 3D modeling.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating realistic 3D animations and visual effects?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Maya is used for creating realistic 3D animations and visual effects.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating digital prototypes and simulations?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Inventor is used for creating digital prototypes and simulations.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D models and visualizations of mechanical designs?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Inventor is used for creating 3D models and visualizations of mechanical designs.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D models and animations for films and visual effects?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Maya is used for creating 3D models and animations for films and visual effects.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D models and animations for architectural visualization?
questions.explanation: Autodesk 3ds Max is used for creating 3D models and animations for architectural visualization.

questions.question: Which Autodesk software is used for creating 3D models and simulations for product design?
questions.explanation: Autodesk Inventor is used for creating 3D models and simulations for product design.
